title: Why do chat restrictions come as a group, then you play one game, then another group?
body:
Seriously? I played 12 games chat restricted, played in a sportsmanlike fashion, managed to win most of those games, then after one game unrestricted, I got 20 more games of chat restriction.

Either: Sort your automated system out, OR give me all 36 games at once.

It's shoddy looking, riot.

replies.body:
Why mention that you won most of them? Winning or not has no merit on your behaviour... well I guess it slightly does but it's not worth as a point toward your good behaviour.

I get the feeling though that the moment you got out of chat restrictions you were immediately reported again and put back into it. Not too sure on the context of it all but you can't erase that as a possibility.
